A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The critics got it right. Alas\, this isn't fanwank like a lot here seem to want. This is a great\, smart\, fun\, big-hearted movie full of flawed\, human characters and clever twists. It's definitely Star Wars and there was clapping in the packed theatre when I saw it. Luke has a great arc -- he starts off jaded and rightfully so. Anyone complaining about SJW angles apparently hasn't seen all the other Star Wars movies. The best since the original.
